## CdkSelectableItemBaseComponent class

A base for a selectable component contained in an [CdkSelectableContainerDirective](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectablecontainerdirective.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class CdkSelectableItemBaseComponent 
```

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [defaultState](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectableitembasecomponent.defaultstate.md) |  | boolean | A default selected state of the component |
|  [id](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectableitembasecomponent.id.md) |  | string \| number | Get a unique identifier value for the component to track the selected status. |
|  [isSelected$](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectableitembasecomponent.isselected_.md) |  | (id: string \| number) =&gt; Observable&lt;[IdSelectPair](./cdk-selectable.idselectpair.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Get an observable emitting the selected status when the selected status changes for a specified id. |
|  [toggleSelection](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectableitembasecomponent.toggleselection.md) |  | () =&gt; void | Toggle the selected status of the component |
